alfredsnippet.snippet:
"[It] is, of course, altogether valueless ... Ours has been the first, and will doubtless be the last, party of whites to visit this profitless locality."

- Lt. Joseph D. Ives, Corps of Topographical Engineers, 1861, on the Grand Canyon
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Grand Canyon Altogether Valueless
